items.title: Constraining Complexity in the Generics Design
items.content_text: A supplementary post to my GopherConAU 2023 talk of the same title.

items.title: Cleanly merge git repositories
items.content_text: I describe how I did a clean, four-way merge of git repositories.

items.title: Operator constraints in Go
items.content_text: I describe four ways to express constraints for operators in generic Go code and the trade-offs involved.

items.title: Calculating type sets is harder than you think
items.content_text: I try to explain why the problem of calculating the exact contents of a type set in Go is harder than it might seem on the surface.
